name: QaiWare
description:
We believe every company should be a payments company in the 21st century. Our mission is to transform payments and payment integration into a commodity for every business. Our expertise lies in the concept development, delivery and optimisation of payment projects. With over 8 years of accumulated domain and business knowledge and more than 10 large payment projects delivered, we know how to solve payment problems for all participants in the payments value chain.
We deliver custom end-to-end solutions with focus on quality, speed, security and agility.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 4 Prof. Dr. Vasil Zlatarski str. Post Code 1799
